DOC.brief_summary: A phase I-II dose range study BMS-275183 ( oral taxane ) combination pemetrexed ( Alimta ) patient recurrent Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) . The safety efficacy combination study .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Taxane Combination With Pemetrexed ( Alimta ) Patients With Recurrent Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Advanced metastatic pretreated NSCLC Measurable disease Adequate hematologic , hepatic renal function . ECOG Performance Status 02 Inability swallow capsule Recent significant cardiovascular disease Women pregnant breastfeeding
